
#|

|| min_weight | float |  | `0.05` |  ||
|| max_weight | float |  | `5.0` |  ||
|| plus_diff_per_sec | float |  | `0.05` |  ||
|| minus_diff_per_sec | float |  | `0.1` |  ||
|| history_time | string |  | `100s` |  ||
|| feedback_time | string |  | `300s` |  ||
|| slow_reply_time | string |  | `1s` |  ||
